attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognize" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognizable action. Guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
